headline: Dentsply Sirona Appoints Mark R. Bezjak as Group Vice President, Americas Regional Commercial Organization
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- DENTSPLY SIRONA Inc. (“Dentsply Sirona” or the "Company") (Nasdaq: XRAY), the world’s largest diversified manufacturer of professional dental products and technologies, today announced the appointment of Mark R. Bezjak as Group Vice President, Americas Regional Commercial Organization, effective January 28. The appointment supports Dentsply Sirona’s continued focus on strengthening commercial execution, deepening customer relationships and accel
